title: Replace missing payment QR with uploaded image-5.png and ensure it ships in production

requirements.text: Replace the appâ€™s static QR asset with the user-uploaded image `image-5.png` so the Payment Section successfully loads the QR from the existing path `/assets/generated/payment-qr.dim_512x512.png` (file location: `frontend/public/assets/generated/payment-qr.dim_512x512.png`).
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/public/assets/generated/payment-qr.dim_512x512.png` exists in the repo after the change and its contents match the user-uploaded `image-5.png` (no visual transformations besides normal responsive rendering in the browser).
In the Payment Section, the QR image renders (the onError fallback does not trigger) when navigating to the payment step.
The QR image is available at runtime at the exact URL path `/assets/generated/payment-qr.dim_512x512.png` in the deployed build.

constraints: Do not change any files under `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`, or anything under `frontend/src/components/ui` (compose instead of editing those).
Keep using the existing QR image URL path `/assets/generated/payment-qr.dim_512x512.png` (do not introduce a new path).
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Changing backend logic or data schema for submissions/payment marking.
Changing the configured UPI deep link (it is already set to `9622655116@ybl` in `frontend/src/config/payment.ts`).
Redesigning the Payment Section UI beyond what is required to ensure the QR asset renders.

edits: Replace the payment QR image with the uploaded PhonePe QR (image-5.png > payment-qr.dim_512x512.png)
